description:
Shichimiya is facing the hard fact that she`s in love with someone else`s boyfriend, and vows to do battle with and vanquish the enemy within once and for all. Rikka is aware of the presence of her emerging rival, but Yuta is clueless to the point of cruelty.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Deszcz leje i smaga... W środku lata
真夏の夜の...雨と鞭[Gauntlet of rain]
